meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of leukocytes.
meanings.sent1: The leukocytic cells help fight off infections in the body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the leukocytic response to the virus.
meanings.sent3: The leukocytic warriors battled the invading germs in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent4: Her leukocytic shield protected her from the harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The leukocytic army marched through the body, defending against illness.

meanings.sent1: The leukocytic treatment targeted the specific white blood cells.
meanings.sent2: The leukocytic activity indicated a strong immune response.
meanings.sent3: The leukocytic party in the bloodstream was in full swing.
meanings.sent4: Her leukocytic nature made her resilient to infections.
meanings.sent5: The leukocytic presence was crucial in fighting off the illness.
